home.medicalTreatmentsTitle: Search from the list of online medical treatments
home.loginRequiredContent: To use this feature, you need to log in to the system. Please log in or register an account to continue.

profile.name: Name
profile.birthdayNote: *Reservations cannot be made by anyone under the age of 15 or over the age of 75.
profile.emailAddressNote:
*The email newsletters for Online Clinic and Cure Station are the same.
Please note that if you register or cancel in either case, your registration and cancellation will be linked.
profile.emptyCreditCard: Your credit card information is not registered.

editProfile.name: Name
editProfile.streetNote: *Online Clinic and membership information is the same. If you change your information on either site, it will be changed in tandem, so please be careful.
editProfile.streetNoteTwo: *If the building name is not provided and the medicine cannot be delivered, we may charge you a re-shipping fee.
editProfile.addresseeNote: If you register your delivery address in advance, you can select a delivery address other than your physical address when making a reservation or application. You can also register a default delivery address.

treatment.reminderScheduledTime: Please start your appointment at the scheduled time
treatment.reminderMedicalQuestionnaire: The medical questionnaire has not been filled out
treatment.reminderStartDateAndTime: Please fill it out before the start date and time of your appointment
treatment.reminderOpenVideoTool: Clicking the 'Start Consultation' button opens the video tool
treatment.reminderTurnOnVideoAndAudioToStartTheCon: When your scheduled appointment time arrives, please turn on the video and audio to start the consultation
treatment.questionCancelReservation: Would you like to cancel the following reservation?
treatment.pleaseSelectReasons: Please select one or more reasons
treatment.pleaseSelectReasonFromOptionBelow: Please select a cancellation reason from the options below
treatment.listReason: Something urgent came up, Long waiting time, Thought it was covered by insurance, Symptoms have disappeared, Have concerns, Decided to use another online clinic (service aspect), Decided to use another online clinic (price aspect), Fell under contraindications, Decided to receive in-person consultation (service aspect), Decided to receive in-person consultation (price aspect), Unable to use camera/microphone, Other

serviceInstructions.explainTheReservationProcess: We will explain the reservation process, including account registration for the initial use of the service. Subsequently, you can also make reservations by logging in and clicking on the 'Appointment' button.

instructions.title: Tapping the "Appointment" button
instructions.content: Please tap the "Appointment" button on the service website.

instructions.title: Treatment menu and date selection
instructions.content: Select the subject and date and time you would like to reserve. If you are a registered member, click "Log in and confirm the date and time" and proceed to step 3. If you are not a registered member, click "Register as a member and confirm the date and time" and proceed to step 4.

instructions.title: Account Login
instructions.content: If you have an account, please log in.
instructions.reminder: *This screen will not be displayed if you are already logged in.

instructions.title: Registration of personal information
instructions.content: You will be asked to enter basic information required for your appointment. Please follow the on-screen instructions.

instructions.title: Enter your authentication code
instructions.content: If you selected "Register as a member and confirm the date and time" in step 2, you will need to confirm the authentication code after entering your personal information.
instructions.reminder: *This step will not be displayed if you have already registered as a member.

instructions.title: Confirmation of reservation details
instructions.content: After entering your personal information, your reservation details will be displayed. Please review them for accuracy and then click the "Make a reservation" button.

instructions.title: Booking is complete
instructions.content: Once your reservation is confirmed, you will see the appointment completion page. You will need to provide necessary information before your appointment starts, so please follow the instructions.

appointment.loginRequiredContentDialog: To use this feature, you need to log in to the system. Please log in or register an account to continue.
appointment.pleaseSelectSpecialistAndMakeReservation: *If you wish to receive treatment from multiple specialists, please select only one specialist and make a reservation. Please declare the name of the specialist you would like to receive treatment from on the medical questionnaire and during the consultation.
appointment.pleaseSelectMenuMedicalDepartment: Please select the menu for your chosen medical department.
appointment.firstTimeDeptVisitors: Those who are visiting the same department at our hospital for the first time
appointment.repeatDeptVisitors: Those who have visited the same department at our hospital at least once
appointment.selectDateTreatment: 2. Select the start date and time of treatment
appointment.contentUpdateAppointmentDialog:
Your treatment appointment details have been updated successfully.
Thank you for your patience.
We have sent the updated details to your registered email address. Please check.
appointment.offersAndInfo: Receive special offers, post-prescription information, and more
appointment.reminderEmailMagazineSubscription:
*The email newsletters for Online Clinic and Cure Station are the same.
Please note that if you register or cancel in either case, your registration and cancellation will be linked.
appointment.reminderNotes:
*Those under 18 and those over 75 cannot be examined.
・There may be cases where certain medications cannot be prescribed due to health conditions, etc.
・You may have to wait depending on how busy it is.
If you do not enter the room and complete the medical questionnaire within 15 minutes of your appointment, your appointment will be canceled.

confirmAppointment.treatmentAppointmentCompletedContent:
Your appointment has been completed
Thank you for your reservation.
We have sent the details to your registered email address. Please check.
confirmAppointment.updateProfileRequiredContent: You need to fully update user information to schedule
confirmAppointment.emailMagazineSubscriptionNote: Receive special offers, post-prescription information, and more
confirmAppointment.emailMagazineSubscriptionNoteTwo:
*The email newsletters for Online Clinic and Cure Station are the same.
Please note that if you register or cancel in either case, your registration and cancellation will be linked.
confirmAppointment.notesTwo:
*Those under 18 and those over 75 cannot be examined.
・There may be cases where certain medications cannot be prescribed due to health conditions, etc.
・You may have to wait depending on how busy it is.
If you do not enter the room and complete the medical questionnaire within 15 minutes of your appointment, your appointment will be canceled.

utils.errorHasOccurred: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
utils.contentSessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue using the app.

register.screenTextBody: Please input and send your e-mail address upon agreeing to the Membership Agreement
register.verifyEmailScreenBodyContent: Authentication code sent to EMAIL-REGISTER. Please input the Authentication code in the e-mail and complete registration.\n*URL is valid for one hour
register.completeRegisterScreenBodyContent: Registration is finish. Please click button below to come back login page.\nThank you!

forgotPassword.screenBodyText1: You wil be sent an e-mail to reset your password.Please enter your registered e-mail address and tap 'Send'.
forgotPassword.screenBodyText2: *You will receive an e-mail from "mail.dmm.com".Please make sure to adjust your domain settings to allow e-mail s from us.
forgotPassword.screenBodyText3: All personal information registered will be utilized as outline in " About personal information security" These wil not be used for reasons other than those listed .
forgotPassword.viewModelMessage404: Email is incorrect or not registered, please try again
forgotPassword.changePasswordText1: Please enter your new password in the form below and click the "Register Password " button
forgotPassword.changePasswordText2: All personal information registered will be utilized as outline in " About personal information security" These wil not be used for reasons other than those listed .
forgotPassword.changePasswordFormCodeTitle: Enter the code from your email
forgotPassword.completeChangeText2: A confirm email has been sent to your registered email address, so please check it
forgotPassword.completeChangeText3: The personal information registered will be handle in accordance with the separately stipulated "Personal information Protection Policy." It will not be used for any purposes other than those started.

TextFieldWidget.requiredQuantityCharacterMessage: Required at least 8 character and one upper case
TextFieldWidget.checkTheSamePasswordMessage: The password must be the same with the confirm password
